terms.title: Terms and Conditions - Hawia Platform
terms.content:
Welcome to Hawia Platform.

By using this website or service, you agree to comply with these Terms and Conditions in full. If you do not agree with any part of them, please do not use the service.

1. Definitions:
- Entity: Refers to JLaL Company.
- User: Anyone who accesses or uses the website or service.
- Service: All services provided through Hawia Platform.

2. Terms of Use:
- The user must be 18 years of age or older.
- The user must use the service legally and ethically.
- Misuse of the platform, hacking attempts, or affecting performance is prohibited.

3. Accounts:
- The user is responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their account information.
- The entity has the right to suspend or cancel any account in case of violation of the terms.

4. Booking and Confirmation:
- Booking is made via WhatsApp communication.
- A booking is not confirmed until approved by the entity.
- A deposit may be required to confirm the order ensure confirmation before paying.
- If a container is unavailable, the customer will be notified immediately.

5. Rental Period:
- The rental period starts from the delivery time.
- Ask about delay duration and pickup of the filled Hawia.
- Late returns will incur additional fees.
- Any extension must be communicated to the entity in advance.

6. Prices and Payment:
- Prices are determined based on Hawia size and rental duration.
- All prices exclude additional fees unless agreed upon.
- Prices are subject to change without prior notice.
- Payments are made through approved methods.
- The entity is not responsible for errors from payment service providers.

7. Customer Responsibility:
- The customer must Maintain the Hawia and do not misuse it.
- The customer bears the cost of any damage or loss.
- It is prohibited to hand over or allow use of the container to another party without approval from the entity.
- Use of the container is entirely at the customer's own responsibility.

8. Intellectual Property:
- All content (texts, images, logos, designs) belongs to Hawia Platform and may not be copied or used without written permission.

9. Return and Exchange Policy:
- According to specific terms announced on the platform or sent to the customer via WhatsApp by the entity.

10. Disclaimer:
- The service is provided as is.
- The entity does not guarantee the service is free from errors or interruptions.
- The entity is not liable for any direct or indirect damages resulting from use.

11. Amendments:
- The entity has the right to modify these terms at any time. Continued use constitutes acceptance of the changes.

12. Legal Liability:
- The platform is not responsible for injuries or damages caused by misuse.
- The customer bears full responsibility during the rental period.

13. Governing Law:
- These terms are governed by the laws and regulations of Saudi Arabia.

14. Contact:
For inquiries, contact:
Email: JLaL@mail.com
Phone: 0555762617
